law.text: The secretary for energy and environment is authorized as required by law, to employ necessary personnel, procure necessary equipment, supplies and services; to enter into contracts in the name of the secretary and to provide funds to any agency of the United States for work or services under the forest pest control program. The secretary for energy and environment may prescribe rules and regulations for carrying out the purposes of KRS 149.610 to 149.680.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 174, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. III, sec. 13(3). -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 95, sec. 8, effective June 16, 1960.
